name: prettyxml
description: XML formatter extension for Visual Studio Code. Formats XML documents just like Visual Studio.

prettyxml.settings.indentSpaceLength.markdownDescription: No. of spaces for indentation. *Default* is *4*

prettyxml.settings.useSingleQuotes.markdownDescription:
Use apostrophe `'` instead of quotes `"`. *Default* is *Unchecked* 

 **Checked** : `Attribute='Value'` 

 **Unchecked** :  `Attribute="Value"`

prettyxml.settings.useSelfClosingTag.markdownDescription:
If no child nodes then use self closing tag `/>`. *Default* is *Checked* 

 **Checked** : `<Foo></Foo>` → `<Foo/>` 

  **Unchecked** : `<Foo></Foo>` → `<Foo></Foo>`

prettyxml.settings.allowSingleQuoteInAtt.markdownDescription:
Allow single quote in attribute values. Ignored if *Use Single Quotes* is *Checked*. *Default* is *Checked* 

  **Checked** : `Attribute="Value'has'apostrphoes"` 

 **Unchecked** : `Attribute="Value'has'apostrphoes"`

prettyxml.settings.addSpaceBeforeSelfClo.markdownDescription:
Add space before self closing tag. *Default* is *Checked* 

 **Checked** : `<Foo />` 

 **Unchecked** : `<Foo/>`

prettyxml.settings.wrapCommentTextWithSp.markdownDescription:
Wrap Comment text with spaces. Ignored if *Preserve White Spaces In Comment* is *Checked*. *Default* is *Checked* 

 **Checked** : `<!-- Comment Text -->` 

 **Unchecked** : `<!--Comment Text-->`

prettyxml.settings.allowWhiteSpaceUnicod.markdownDescription:
Allow unicode whitespace characters in attribute values. *Default* is *Checked* 

 **Checked** : 

 `
` → `
` 

 `	` or `	` → `	` 

 `>` → `>` 

 **Unchecked** :

 `
` → new line  

 `	` or `	` → tab 

 > → `>`

prettyxml.settings.positionFirstAttribut.markdownDescription:
Position first attribute on same line. *Unchecked* on this setting will be ignored if *Position All Attributes On First Line*=*Checked*. *Default* is *Checked* 

 **Checked** : 

 `<Element Attribute="Value"` 

 **Unchecked** : 

 `<Element` 

    `Attribute="Value"`

prettyxml.settings.positionAllAttributes.markdownDescription:
Position all attributes on same line as element. Setting this to *Checked* will ignore *Position First Attribute On Same Line*=*Unchecked*. *Default* is *Unchecked.* 

 **Checked** : 

 `<Element Attribute1="Value1" Attribute2="Value2"` 

 **Unchecked** :

`<Element Attribute1="Value1"`

         `Attribute2="Value2"`

prettyxml.settings.wildCardedExceptionsF.markdownDescription: Exceptions for Position all attributes on same line as element. Wildcards accepted.

prettyxml.settings.preserveWhiteSpacesIn.markdownDescription:
Preserves whitespaces in comment. Setting this *Checked* ignores *Wrap Comment Text With Spaces* setting. Default is *Unchecked* 

 **Checked** : 

 `<!--`    `Comment`    `-->` 

 **Unchecked** : 

 `<!--Comment-->`

prettyxml.settings.addSpaceBeforeEndOfXm.markdownDescription:
Adds space before end of XML declaration. Default is *Unchecked* 

 **Checked** : 

 `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>` 

 **Unchecked** : 

 `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>`

prettyxml.settings.attributesInNewlineTh.markdownDescription:
Attributes count threshold to position attributes in newlines. Default is *1*. This setting only works when **Position first attribute on same line** is enabled.

For example if threshold=2, all attributes will be on same line if an element has only 2 attributes,

otherwise each attribute will be placed on newline.

More Info: [GitHub](https://github.com/pmahend1/PrettyXML?tab=readme-ov-file#attributes-in-newline-threshold)
